fields.name: ConflictPolicy
fields.description: Gets or sets the Conflict Policy property. This property sets policy during conflict of resources during restore from vault.

fields.name: ExcludedNamespaces
fields.description: Gets or sets the exclude namespaces property. This property sets the namespaces to be excluded during restore from vault.

fields.name: ExcludedResourceTypes
fields.description: Gets or sets the exclude resource types property. This property sets the resource types to be excluded during restore from vault.

fields.name: IncludeClusterScopeResources
fields.description: Gets or sets the include cluster resources property. This property if enabled will include cluster scope resources during restore from vault.

fields.name: IncludedNamespaces
fields.description: Gets or sets the include namespaces property. This property sets the namespaces to be included during restore from vault.

fields.name: IncludedResourceTypes
fields.description: Gets or sets the include resource types property. This property sets the resource types to be included during restore from vault.

fields.name: LabelSelectors
fields.description: Gets or sets the LabelSelectors property. This property sets the resource with such label selectors to be included during restore from vault.

fields.name: NamespaceMappings
fields.description: Gets or sets the Namespace Mappings property. This property sets if namespace needs to be change during restore from vault.

fields.name: PersistentVolumeRestoreMode
fields.description: Gets or sets the PV (Persistent Volume) Restore Mode property. This property sets whether volumes needs to be restored from vault.

fields.name: RestoreHookReferences
fields.description: Gets or sets the restore hook references. This property sets the hook reference to be executed during restore from vault.

fields.name: StagingResourceGroupId
fields.description: Gets or sets the staging RG Id for creating staging disks and snapshots during restore from vault.

fields.name: StagingStorageAccountId
fields.description: Gets or sets the staging Storage Account Id for creating backup extension object store data during restore from vault.
